verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}"Lovest thou me" Thou askest Lord of me Would that my heart had Power to answer Thee "Thou know'st all things yea Lord in heav'n above And earth beneath Thou knowest Thee I love"{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}But 'tis not so In words in deed in thought I do not - cannot love Thee As I ought Ah Lord Thy love must Reach my aching heart For all I need in love Thyself Thou art{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thy love must give that power Thy love alone There's nothing worthy Of Thee but Thine own Lord with the love Wherewith Thou lovest me Reflected on Thyself Would I love Thee{/lang-eng}
